trends: There have been 61 other sightings in Kokomo
There were no other sightings in Kokomo on or around September 27th 2008
divs: sighting detailsa black triangular object with a light in each corner of it was above the walmart store in kokomo indiana at approximately 9:04 pm. the lights were red, green, and some sort of color prism emitting white with blue strobing hues. there was no sound from my perspective. the object was traveling slowly moving north-northwest. it was a very clear night with many small airplanes in the vicinity during this time. many stars were visible also. witnesses, three, myself, daughter, and mother. i reported this via phone on the same night (sept. 27th) to glen means from indiana mufon. i did not watch the object leave the skyway as i entered the walmart to shop. no one else seemed to be looking upward towards the sky. the object definitely had a triangular shape and it had mass to it. i could not see stars or sky on the other side of the object...the triangle was all black, and could not see thru it at all. my daughter( who has 20\15 vision) said she could see "squiggly lines underneath the object.
